name: Spectre (1991)
description: Spectre is a computer game for the Apple Macintosh, developed in 1990 by Peninsula Gameworks and published in 1991 by Velocity Development. It is a 3D tank battle reminiscent of the arcade game Battlezone. Later games in the series were released for the PC and SNES, with Spectre VR being named to a number of lists of best video games..
